chapters.title: Recording Introduction & Project Overview
chapters.description: The narrator begins by stating the date (May 3rd, 1986), explaining their attempt to record their life story, acknowledging potential errors and omissions, and outlining the scope of the project â€“ a recounting of their life from childhood after leaving Iowa.
